main event: An observer in Kew Gardens, New York, reported seeing a bright light in the sky that changed colors from blue to red and back while moving quickly, before disappearing.
interesting points: The object changed color from white to orange and back repeatedly,The observer used binoculars to get a clearer view of the object,The sighting lasted approximately 35 minutes,The object appeared round and emitted a bright light brighter than the surrounding stars,The object was estimated to be about 20 feet in diameter.
sighted object: a bright, round object emitting light
witness description: male, age 20, studying chemical engineering at college
